title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-user, model manager, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool to chat, pull, list, delete models; built with Node.js.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code suggestions via Ollama (GitHub Copilot alternative).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service inside CI pipelines for LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and answer questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP client for Ollama with serde types and tokio streams.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app bringing Ollama LLMs into channels with DM and @mention support.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama chat and embeddings inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and native io.Reader streaming.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama demonstrating http client and JSON parsing in 200 lines.
